subject: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Dear,
How are you today? Sequel to the previous email that I sent to you regarding our transaction which we have not finalized due to lack of money to pay for the charges that will enable us conclude this transaction.
As a matter of all details, I have been able to discussed with my contact person where the funds is currently being lodge in Finance Security Firm as I really want us to finalize this transaction within this month which he gave me good news today that you will not spend any money from your pocket till you receive your funds.
In our series of discussion today, he made me to understand that what is required is to get oil that will be used to clean up the funds before releasing it to you either through cash or bank transfer and what you need is to have a valid international passport which you will use to go to where we will buy the oil as the bonafide beneficiary of the funds and bring it with some gifts like (clothes, shoes or history books) that will be given to the Officials in the Finance Security Firm.
Actually, you should note that it's my contact person will take care of your expenses both flight tickets and hotel accommodation so don't hesitate to get back to me as soon as you receive this message with copy of your valid international passport with the name of your nearest airport to enable us move forward towards conclusion of this transaction for you to receive your funds and start investments of your choice and thereby enjoys the fruits of your labour as God has answered our prayers. Thanks for your maximum co-operations and understanding towards conclusion of this transaction. Have a nice day and remain blessed.
Waiting for your urgent response.
Best regards,
Mr. William Harry.
NB: You are to reply this message to my private email address 
williamharryw6@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Mr. William Harry,

I hope this message finds you well. Your email certainly piqued my interest, especially the part about not having to spend any money from my pocket till I receive the funds. That sounds like a good deal!

However, I'm a bit confused about the oil that will be used to clean up the funds. Could you please explain more about this process? It's new to me and I'd love to understand it better.

Also, regarding the gifts for the Officials in the Finance Security Firm, what kind of clothes or shoes do they prefer? And are there any specific history books they might be interested in?

I'm really looking forward to hearing more details about this opportunity.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Dear David, Acknowledgement.
body:
Dear David,

I received your message and the contents are quite understood. Obviously, I
will discuss with my contact person regarding the trip and keep you posted,

You are to reconfirm your full name, residential address, nationality,
whatsapp number, occupation, valid international passport and nearest
airport so that my contact person will book your flight tickets and make
your hotel reservation so that you will embark on the trip to receive your
funds as arranged, I hope you are ready to make the trip within this week
for us to finalize this transaction without wasting much time. Thanks, and
have a nice day.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
Mr. William Harry
NB: It's my contact person that will purchase the oil and Gifts that will
be given to the Officials to hasten up their efforts to release your funds.

subject: Re: Dear David, Acknowledgement.
body:
Hello Mr. William Harry,

Thank you for your prompt response and the details provided. It's quite an exciting prospect to embark on a trip, isn't it? I'm curious about the location of this trip, could you please share more about it?

As for the information you requested, I'm afraid I can't provide them at this moment due to privacy concerns. However, I'd be more than happy to continue our conversation and learn more about this opportunity.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Dear David, Acknowledgement.
body:
If you really want to receive your funds then provide the information
requested for us to move forward.

subject: Re: Dear David, Acknowledgement.
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide more details about the funds and the process involved? I would appreciate it if you could explain everything step by step.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Dear David, Acknowledgement.
body: Send your details for us to move forward.

subject: Re: Dear David, Acknowledgement.
body:
Hello there! I'm really excited to move forward with this. Could you please provide me with more information about what exactly we're moving forward with? I'd love to understand more about it.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Dear David, Acknowledgement.
body:
I said that you should reconfirm your full details first before we can
proceed.

subject: Re: Dear David, Acknowledgement.
body:
Hello there! I appreciate your request, but I'm afraid I can't provide my full details at this time. However, I'd love to learn more about what we're proceeding with. Could you please share more information?

Best wishes,
David
